```{r}
# Load necessary library and dataset
library(tidyverse)
data("Orange")

# Define function to pivot wider
transform_pivotwide <- function(data, cols, name, value) {
  new_data <-
    pivot_wider(data, id_cols = all_of(cols),
              names_from = all_of(name), values_from = all_of(value))
  return(new_data)
}

# Run function on loaded data
transformed_orange <- transform_pivotwide(Orange, cols = "Tree", name = "age", value = "circumference")

print(transformed_orange)
```
